resources.string: This is a helper app for City of The Great Machine S&C mode. Once you have planned your next move, you can use this app to find out the probability of detainment for your plan. Be prepared to enter the cards currently in the movement deck, along with the number of detainment\'s each card will cause when drawn by each servant. Click the button below to proceed.
There are 13 cards in the deck
stay still and make guard card
This is the overview fragment. real data will be added soon
For each servant, enter the number of detainment\'s that this card will trigger if it is drawn by that servant.
